price: 38. Mokolo molimo mosantu mpe na ba anzelu bakotelema molongo moko mpe moto akozala na liloba te longola sé oyo Ar-Rahmân(1) (Allah) akopesa ye ndingisa mpe akoloba sé bosembo.
arabic: يَوۡمَ يَقُومُ ٱلرُّوحُ وَٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ صَفّٗاۖ لَّا يَتَكَلَّمُونَ إِلَّا مَنۡ أَذِنَ لَهُ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ وَقَالَ صَوَابٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: yawma yaqūmu al-rūḥu wal-malāikatu ṣaffan lā yatakallamūna illā man adhina lahu al-raḥmānu waqāla ṣawāban
